name: A Very Safe Home
description:
Description

Family members are what makes home a home. We took it too literally. 

In life, there are definitely moments when we feel down. Adversities in life, such as Stress,  Debt, Bickering, Alcohol etc, constantly attack us, and we often turn to our family to shield us from these unfortunate incidents.

Instructions

Click on the people and lay them around your house to protect it from incoming comets.  Right click or mouse scroll to rotate them.  

Global Game Jam 2019
